Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.controller

Class DataVisualizationController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.controller.DataVisualizationController
@Controller public class DataVisualizationController extends Object
Data visualization controller, maps all chart and report generating code
Author:
antho

  • Method Details

    • showSQLPage

      @RequestMapping("/charts/{id}") public String showSQLPage(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      showSQLPage receives the id path variable and maps to the charts html page. returns chartGeneration
      Parameters:
      id - Path Variable receives group id to find all the users with that group id
      model - model attributes for reviewee repository, evaluation log, and role
      Returns:
      /chartGeneration Returns the chart generation page where charts and pdf reports can be made from evaluations

    • handlePieChartSQL

      @RequestMapping("/piechartGenerator/{id}") public void handlePieChartSQL(@PathVariable("id") long id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws IOException, SQLException
      Receives the reviewee id as path variable and finds all logs of all completed evaluations for that reviewee, then generates pie charts using the average for that reviewee
      Parameters:
      id - Path Variable id receives reviewee id to find the completed logs linked to that id
      response - HttpServletResponse needed to display charts on webpage
      Throws:
      IOException - provides information on various IO exceptions produced by failed or interrupted IO operations
      SQLException - provides information on a database access error or other SQL errors

    • handlePdfReports

      @GetMapping("/generatePdf/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> handlePdfReports(@PathVariable("id") long id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws IOException, SQLException
      Receives the group id and pulls logs for every level of evaluation for every reviewee and generates a pdf report saved to the project folder based on the group averages
      Parameters:
      id - Path Variable id receives reviewee id
      response - HttpServletResponse is needed to display on webpage
      request - HttpServletRequest is needed to redirect back to current group page
      Returns:
      returns responseEntity<>
      Throws:
      IOException - provides information on various IO exceptions produced by interrupted or failed IO operations
      SQLException - provides information on a database access error or other SQL errors
